Reviews.Title: I love Dell Note bookes
Reviews.Author: Gela Gelashvili "ggela"
Reviews.Content: I used to have a lot of notebooks, more than 200, different brands.. everally I can say that Dell has great laptops, I like espessially inspiron series.. processors and cooling sistem are great.. touchpad and keybord are good..and price is not high..I recomend  everione to buy dell's laptops

ProductInfo.Features:
Dell Inspiron E1505 15-Inch Laptop
1.67 GHz T2300 Intel Core Duo Processor, 2GB RAM
40GB Hard Drive, 8X DVD+/-RW Drive
802.11b/g WiFi
Windows XP Media Center
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron E1505 15-Inch Laptop (1.67 GHz T2300 Intel Core Duo Processor, 2GB RAM, 60GB Hard Drive, 8X DVD+/-RW Drive, 802.11b/g WiFi, Windows XP Media Center)
